Sentencas: A new indirect integration of a solid oxide fuel cell, a gas turbine and a domestic water heater is proposed and analyzed in detail.
Titulo: Thermodynamic and exergoeconomic assessments of a new solid oxide fuel cell-gas turbine cogeneration system

Sentencas: Using a proper working fluid for each subsystem, interacting thermally with one another, the proposed system generates power and hot water simultaneously.
Titulo: Thermodynamic and exergoeconomic assessments of a new solid oxide fuel cell-gas turbine cogeneration system

Sentencas: Thermodynamic and thermoeconomic principles are used to determine the products costs and the order of significance of system components from the viewpoint of exergy destruction.
Titulo: Thermodynamic and exergoeconomic assessments of a new solid oxide fuel cell-gas turbine cogeneration system

Sentencas: Parametric studies are carried out to reveal the influence on the system performance of several decisive parameters.
Titulo: Thermodynamic and exergoeconomic assessments of a new solid oxide fuel cell-gas turbine cogeneration system

Sentencas: The results show that the exergy efficiency is maximized at a compressor pressure ratio of 9.49 and a current density of 1642 A m(-2).
Titulo: Thermodynamic and exergoeconomic assessments of a new solid oxide fuel cell-gas turbine cogeneration system

Sentencas: The increase in pressure ratio however, is not in favor of system's economic performance.
Titulo: Thermodynamic and exergoeconomic assessments of a new solid oxide fuel cell-gas turbine cogeneration system

Sentencas: In addition, the sum of unit costs of the products is minimized at a current density of 1523 A m(-2).
Titulo: Thermodynamic and exergoeconomic assessments of a new solid oxide fuel cell-gas turbine cogeneration system

Sentencas: Moreover, it is shown that an increase in the gas turbine inlet temperature or steam to carbon ratio deteriorates both the thermodynamic and economic performances of the system.
Titulo: Thermodynamic and exergoeconomic assessments of a new solid oxide fuel cell-gas turbine cogeneration system

Sentencas: Furthermore, the results indicate that a higher fuel utilization factor improves the thermodynamic and economic behavior of the system.
Titulo: Thermodynamic and exergoeconomic assessments of a new solid oxide fuel cell-gas turbine cogeneration system

Sentencas: Finally, it is revealed that an increase in the gas turbine air flow rate enhances the energy efficiency and worsens the sum of unit costs of the products.
Titulo: Thermodynamic and exergoeconomic assessments of a new solid oxide fuel cell-gas turbine cogeneration system

Sentencas: The exergy efficiency however, is maximized at a gas turbine air flow rate of 15.94 mol s(-1).
Titulo: Thermodynamic and exergoeconomic assessments of a new solid oxide fuel cell-gas turbine cogeneration system
